entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
